DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see safe effective use IM862 treat Kaposi 's sarcoma ( KS ) AIDS patient .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness Experimental Drug , IM862 , Treating Kaposi 's Sarcoma AIDS Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Patients stratify CD4 count , viral load , prior systemic chemotherapy . Patients randomize equally receive either IM862 placebo give intranasally every day . Patients see every 4 week 6 month disease progression evaluate toxicity efficacy . Quality life assess treatment , every month 6 month . At end 6-month study evaluation period , patient PR/CR ( responder ) remain study continue blind treatment additional 6 month . For patient stable disease ( non-responders ) , treatment assignment unblinded off-study IM862 compassionate use offer 6 month , regardless treatment group . For patient document progressive disease ( treatment failure ) , treatment assignment unblinded off-study IM862 offer 6 month patient placebo group . For treatment failure IM862 group , IM862 stop patient allow therapy option .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients may eligible study : Are HIVpositive . Have AIDSrelated Kaposi 's sarcoma . Have least 5 skin mouth sore require chemotherapy . Have take antiHIV drug least 8 week study entry change regimen . Are least 18 year old . Agree practice effective method birth control . Exclusion Criteria Patients eligible study : Have AIDSrelated opportunistic infection ( except genital herpes ) within 2 week study entry . Have another type cancer within past 2 year ( except certain type skin cancer , cervical cancer , anal cancer ) . Have severe chest cold . Have certain serious medical condition . Have receive certain medication , include chemotherapy , within past 4 week . Abuse alcohol drug . Are pregnant breastfeeding .
